headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://*.googletagmanager.com https://*.google-analytics.com https://umami.itscattime.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' fonts.gstatic.com; img-src 'self' data: https://*.google-analytics.com; connect-src 'self' https://*.google-analytics.com; frame-ancestors 'none';
